data.name: H1Z1: Just Survive - FREE Lucky Star Shirt Skin
data.detailed_description:
How do you still look good when the world has fallen apart? Some would say it’s because you’re the star of this story. Others think you’re just lucky. Show them all that it’s just because you have great style by wearing the Lucky Star Shirt.

The Lucky Star Cosmetic pack contains 1 cosmetic skin that can be applied to your character’s in-game appearance in H1Z1: Just Survive. Check out the other Just Survive Cosmetic packs and look for more personalization items found in crates in Just Survive. The H1Z1: Just Survive base game and a free Daybreak Account is required to purchase this pack.

data.short_description: How do you still look good when the world has fallen apart? Some would say it’s because you’re the star of this story. Others think you’re just lucky. Show them all that it’s just because you have great style by wearing the FREE Lucky Star Shirt.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i3 Dual-Core with Hyper-Threading (required)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 275 series or higher / AMD Radeon HD 4870 X2 series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad Core or higher / AMD Phenom II X6 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 960 series or higher / AMD Radeon R9 280X series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card
